data.title: Friendly staff, clean room, nice pool area
data.text: Enjoyed our 4 night stay and found the staff to be very helpful and friendly.  Check-in was efficient and we had auto check-out and the bill was accurate that was slid under our door on our departure morning.  USA today was outside our door in the morning on weekdays which was a nice touch.  There is always coffee, hot water, and water in the lobby with to-go cups in addition to having Keurig machines in the room.  Beds were very comfortable with lots of pillows.  Bathroom is a little small with limited counter space however was very clean and well stock with towels, soap, shampoo, etc.  Air conditioner/heater unit control was not very good as the room varied about 5 degrees with the same setting on the thermostat.  We were on the 4th floor and our room was quiet.

data.title: 15 Minutes From Everything
data.text:
We came to Minneapolis for National Portfolio Day at the Minneapolis College of Art & Design. This hotel is convenient to everything we wanted to do and see, while it was also away from busier areas. Somehow it seemed to be 15 minutes from MCAD/MIA, the zoo, the Mall of America, the Blick art supply store, and Minnehaha Falls. I will definitely consider this hotel for future visits. 
We were really impressed that there was a fridge and microwave as often hotels with a restaurant won't have those. We ate dinner at the restaurant one night; my daughter didn't love what she got and the waiter swapped her out for something else.

data.title: Friendly staff.
data.text: The staff was very friendly, but the hotel is in need of upgrades- especially the lobby which has worn furniture.  The room was spacious and had a microwave and refrigerator.  The hotel offered room service from the restaurant in the lobby.

owner_response.author: IHGService, Guest Relations Manager at Holiday Inn Bloomington - Airport South, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear LucindaR_11,

Thank you for posting a candid feedback from your recent stay with us. It is great to know that you were able to appreciate the friendliness of our staff and the size of our room. However, I was concerned to see that you found our hotel to be in need of an upgrade. Rest assured, your comments will be shared with our management team to properly address your concern.
 
Again, thank you for the review and I hope that we would have another chance to accommodate you again in the future. 
 
Regards, 
 
Mike F. 
Case Manager 
IHGService
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Bummed, thinking it was the location that used to be on American BLVD
data.text:
First place, I booked on the IHG App, thought I was going to the same hotel I have been too several times before on American BLVD.  Prime location for me, close to family, close to the area I know like the back of my hand and most importantly a clean, updated, and new hotel!   

This location is none of those!

The hotel on 94th was okay, but old, outdated and not the cleanest.  Bathroom had hair and dirt/dust piled up in the corners, the shower curtain liner was dirty and there were stains on the carpet.

We ate at the Green Mill attached, food was good, but the waitress who was sitting at the bar (not our waitress) was very loud and voicetress!  If she dropped the F-Bomb 5 times, she surely did 50 times while we were there.  In addition to the obscenities we listened to at dinner, the restaurant was filthy.

I will be staying in a different location next time.... Sad to say, it may not be an IHG hotel if the location does't fit my needs.

owner_response.author: IHGService, Guest Relations Manager at Holiday Inn Bloomington - Airport South, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear AmandaJean1105,

Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at our hotel. While we are pleased with the fair overall rating you have given particularly highlighting our location serving its purpose for your travel needs, it is regrettable that the overall cleanliness of the room you have stayed at including your dining experience may have fallen below your expectations. Please allow me to apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you. Rest assured, we take our guest's comments very seriously and always strive to provide a wonderful stay. I have faith in our hotel that they will continue to do their best to improve our amenities and services.

Once again, thank you for sharing your feedback. I truly hope that we will have a chance to make it up to you and provide you with a better stay in the future.

Sincerely,

Alvin M.
Case Manager
IHGService
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Only good feature is the Pool
data.text:
The one good thing about this hotel was that the pool area was very nice.  Perfect for families or groups wanting to kick back and relax.  It is decorated like an outdoor grotto, has a hot tub, and the Green Mill is right by the pool so easy access to adult beverages/food. 

Unfortunately that was the only thing we were impressed with.  We had a terrible check in experience that took 20 minutes because the hotel was over sold.  The desk staff were unprofessional.  The rooms were a fine size but pretty marginally cleaned.  The sheets on one of our beds were really scratchy and the bathrooms do not have fans so it was always wet and humid in there. 

It definitely was over priced.

owner_response.author: IHGService, Guest Relations Manager at Holiday Inn Bloomington - Airport South, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear kmcbod5,

Thank you for posting a candid feedback from your recent stay with us. It is great to know that you were able to appreciate our pool area. However, I was concerned to see that you were not impressed with our check in process, front desk staff service, bed sheets, and bathroom ventilation among the others. I would like to apologize for any inconvenience these issues may have caused you during your stay. Rest assured, your comments will be shared with our management team to properly address your concerns.
 
Again, thank you for the review and I hope that we would have another chance to accommodate you again in the future. 
 
Regards, 
 
Mike F. 
Case Manager 
IHGService
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great hotel
data.text: Great hotel. Booked thru priceline. Room had a kureg coffee maker. Great ac. They were able to fax documents for me for free.  Friendly staff. Would definitely stay here again. Also they have a restaurant.

data.title: Pretty Decent
data.text:
Hotel was nice and clean.

Some things needed upgrading, bathroom was tiny with no counter space, but Bed and pillows were very comfy and the hotel staff were super friendly!
Great place if you have a family; the pool and hot tub were great. 

Kids were everywhere when we were there so we couldn't really relax and enjoy the hot tub as much. We are 30 years old and like to sit and chat in the evenings. Kids were in the hot tub and splashing around with no parental supervision. 
Also the hot tub it's self is a tile, man made space and not a real molded hot tub so it wasn't very comfortable. 

Also would be even better if they had a continental breakfast. 

This location isn't very close to many places. Have to basically drive everywhere. It worked out for us as we had a car. 

Overall it's a nice place to stay and I would probably stay there again.

data.title: Pet Owners Call First
data.text:
I booked this hotel online via the IHG website and it stated the hotel was pet friendly. When I arrived to the hotel the employee at the front desk stated "we are trying to get away from accepting pets." They let me keep my dog there because I had already booked. I'm not sure when they will officially go "pet free" but if you have a pet you may want to call first to check. 

As for the hotel, it was very clean. As other reviewers said the rooms are showing their age, but that doesn't bother me. As long as the room is clean and in good condition I am happy. Convenient location. Clean rooms. Friendly staff.

data.title: Clean hotel reasonably priced
data.text: Nice hotel a little way from Mall of America. Clean rooms and friendly staff. Big bonus is it has a Green Mill restaurant attached which is great pizza. Only drawback is no free breakfast which would have been nice but there is a grocery store close by to pick something up.

data.title: Average Holiday Inn
data.text: I am a Holiday Inn fan and unfortunately this one disappointed me. It was clean however it is showing its wear. Just seemed like it really needed an update. The bathroom did not have a fan which to me in a hotel is a must. Staff was nice enough but just would probably chose differently next time.

owner_response.author: IHGService, Guest Relations Manager at Holiday Inn Bloomington - Airport South, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Shannon K, 

Thank you choosing our hotel and leaving a review. I appreciate your nice remarks about the staff. We work diligently to ensure our facilities are well maintained and we try our hardest to provide a good value, comfortable, and superior accommodations.  It is truly regrettable that you were disappointed with your stay.  Your feedback about the bathroom fan and overall quality of the facilities will be certainly addressed with the appropriate parties.  Allow me to apologize for any inconvenience these issues may have caused you.  I am confident the hotel management will take necessary actions to improve our guest satisfaction. 

I value you as our guest and hope you will continue to choose IHG for your future travel needs.  

Sincerely,  
 
Lera P 
Case Manager  
IHGService
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Decent hotel - Good Location
data.text: I have stayed at this Holiday Inn many times and find that it is a decent place to stay for the money at a good location.  The front desk help are always pleasant to deal with.  The rooms are clean although the bathrooms are a bit on the small side.  The AC's could use updating/service as they are a little noisy.  I do like the Green Mill restaurant attached to the hotel as the food has always been good.   Overall, this is a good choice and you can feel safe and secure here.

owner_response.author: IHGService, Guest Relations Manager at Holiday Inn Bloomington - Airport South, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Falcon3773,

Thank you so much for staying with us and for taking the time to leave us your feedback. I appreciate your compliments regarding our good location, clean rooms and exemplary customer service. Your review is vital for improving the service and quality we offer to our valued guest. It is always hugely motivating when one takes the time and trouble to acknowledge or give points for improvement. We hope to get the opportunity of welcoming you back in the future. Thank you once again for your valuable comment, and if you might have any suggestions that will contribute to enhancing your stay, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Sincerely,

Krysllin G.
Case Manager
IHGService
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Split Personality Hotel
data.text: The hotel right now is a little bit of a split personality.... Granite countertops in the bathroom but then really old tile and wallpaper.  Friendly and accommodating front desk but run down lobby furniture...Pool area was very nice and looked recently remodeled but the pool itself was pretty small.  And pool towels are super small! Our stay was just fine, but nothing above average.  Breakfast isn't included in the price of your stay but I saw when booking that you could get a deal when adding it to your room rate.

owner_response.author: IHGService, Guest Relations Manager at Holiday Inn Bloomington - Airport South, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear jamie l,

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback regarding your stay with us. Your comments are highly valuable to us and will assist us in our continuous efforts to maintain and improve the facilities and service level we aim for. I am happy to learn you appreciate our friendly front desk staff. However, please accept my sincere apology for the shortcomings you experienced during your stay and if your stay was negatively affected by the overall condition of the hotel facilities and amenities. We are hospitality professionals who pride ourselves on delivering world class service and for that reason, your comments will surely be looked into.

I hope if you get back to the area, you will consider staying at our hotel.

Sincerely,   

Zelyn N
Case Manager 
IHGService
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Clean, quiet, and great!
data.text: This is one of the nicest Holiday Inns I have stayed in, considering I travel 10 months out of the year. The staff were so friendly and helpful and the room incredibly clean and modern. It was easy to sign up for the airport shuttle (which goes on the hour) and it was nice to have a restaurant on-site that also serves breakfast, since the hotel does not have breakfast. I will definitely be back when I travel through that area again.

data.title: Clean and Friendly Hotel
data.text: Stayed here on our short vacation to the Mall of America.  Our room was clean.  The front desk and the lady who was our shuttle driver to the Mall were friendly and very helpful.  The pool was nice. Would stay here again.

data.title: Park and Fly Stay
data.text:
Stayed here with my family for park and fly for a spring break vacation to Mexico.  Park and Fly experience was fantastic, going to the airport and returning.  All of the service at the hotel was great.  Staff were very friendly and helpful.  Also a nice restaurant onsite.

Overall a great experience, and I would recommend staying for park and fly.

owner_response.author: , Front Office Manager at Holiday Inn Bloomington - Airport South, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear UticaBrewCrew-

Thank you very much for your outstanding response! We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay with us prior to your vacation to Mexico. We always strive to offer a friendly and relaxing experience before your travels; it seems that we accomplished that! We greatly appreciate your recommendation and truly hope to have you back very soon. Thank you for choosing the Holiday Inn Bloomington Airport South; we hope to see you very soon!

Best Regards-
Meighan S
Guest Service Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: CLEAN AND SMOKE FREE
data.text:
Called after 7pm, even tho he was busy he answered my call and questions. They were almost FULL and he fit us in at the last minute.  The prices were very reasonable.  The Green Mill attached restaurant was very kind also.  Had a salad, it was fresh and good.  Good service also.
The rooms were clean and didn't stink, that is what matters to me.
Not quite sure why this hotel or any hotel advertise WIFI as it never works.  Well my old dial up internet was better than any hotel internet.

owner_response.author: , Front Office Manager at Holiday Inn Bloomington - Airport South, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Journeyone-

Thank you so much for your valued time and feedback. I am so pleased that you enjoyed your stay and received fantastic customer service from start to finish. I will pass along your comments to the front desk and restaurant staff. I am hapy that you also enjoyed your fresh and clean sleeping room! Also, we appreciate your feedback on our WiFi; as we are currently in the process of upgrading our system to offer a better experience. We thank you for choosing the Holiday Inn Bloomington Airport South, we look forward to your next stay!

Best Regards-
Meighan S
Guest Service Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: A bit worn
data.text: We stayed here just one night for a dance competition. The room was a bit musty and dated, however the beds were extremely comfortable. Our tub/shower combo drained slowly so after just a 5 minute shower you were standing in 6 in. of water, then you listened to it slowly drain for 30 min afterward. Will stay again if I need to, but will probably look elsewhere if I have options.

owner_response.author: , Front Office Manager at Holiday Inn Bloomington - Airport South, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Amy O-

Thank you so much for your valued time and feedback. I truly appreciate you bringing these issues to our attention so we have the opportunity to correct them and improve guest satisfaction going forward. I am very sorry that you had maintenance issues as well as overall guest room complaints, i have forwarded your incidents to our engineering department. Please know that we are beginning a full remodel in the following months, to improve our location and value. We truly hope to have you back very soon and hope to offer you a much better stay! Thank you!

Best Regards,
Meighan S
Guest Service Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great customer service and comfortable beds
data.text: Hotel customer service was very helpful in setting up a cab for us when we wanted to venture out.  They gave us suggestions for food and night life and were helpful with check in/out.  They made our stay great!  Room and bed linens were also clean and comfortable. Only downfall was no continental breakfast included.  However, there was breakfast available for purchase in the attached Green Mill.  Free WiFi and very nice pool/hot tub!

owner_response.author: , Front Office Manager at Holiday Inn Bloomington - Airport South, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear luvs2travel13-

Thank you so much for your wonderful feedback and valuable time! I am so happy that our staff was helpful and accommodating; offering information and advice whenever possible! We are so glad that your guest room was clean and comfortable as well, and that you were able to enjoy our awesome pool and hot tub area! The next time you book, please ask about our breakfast inclusive rates! Thank you for choosing the Holiday Inn Bloomington Airport South, we hope to see you very soon!

Best Regards,
Meighan S
Guest Service Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Best holiday inn hotel I have stayed in!
data.text: This hotel was one of the best holiday inn hotels I stayed at. The front desk people were great very friendly and would do anything to make your stay better. The week we went there was a big snow storm and it was hitting the way I had to go home so they gave us a very good price to stay another night.  The general manager is excellent.

owner_response.author: , Front Office Manager at Holiday Inn Bloomington - Airport South, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Megan F-

Thank you SO much for your outstanding review! We could not be more appreciative and proud to be one of the best Holiday Inn's you have ever visited! That is such an amazing compliment, thank you so much!! I am pleased that our staff accommodated you during our recent snow storm, we totally understand how that can mess up travel plans! We thank you for choosing the Holiday Inn Bloomington Airport South; we look forward to your next visit and hope it is very soon!

Best Regards,
Meighan S
Guest Service Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: One of the better MSP values !
data.text:
This is an updated review.  Ok this may not be the most luxurious or upscale hotel.  But..... for the price, this is one of the better options.  Friendly staff, clean rooms, and Green Mill on-site.  Tuesday's they have a managers reception by the pool for Priority Club members.  Some appetizers, beer, wine and assorted soft drinks.   On this particular visit, the lady "host" of this event was great !  Very friendly and continually serving each guest who attended.  I've been to other "manager receptions" where they offer 2 small draft beers or glasses of wine.  Not here........  Good choices by the bottle and a friendly gal.

Would recommend this place.  Only about 4 or maybe 5 miles from airport an even closer to the MOA (Mall of America).

owner_response.author: , Front Office Manager at Holiday Inn Bloomington - Airport South, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Kubzfan-

Thank you so much for your wonderful review! I am so pleased that you found us to be a great value in the MSP/Bloomington area! We are so happy that you enjoyed our friendly staff, clean rooms and outstanding restaurant! Also, we are glad that you loved our "IHG Reward Member Reception"! We take great pride in offering this function for our wonderful rewards members, and we appreciate your loyalty so very much! Thank you for choosing the Holiday Inn Bloomington Airport South, we look forward to your next stay!

Best Regards,
Meighan S
Guest Service Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response
